query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS taskHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  historyId VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  taskId VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  changedByUserId INT NOT NULL,
  changeType ENUM('created', 'status_changed', 'priority_changed', 'due_date_changed', 'reassigned', 'notes_added', 'completed', 'cancelled', 'edited') NOT NULL,
  oldValue LONGTEXT,
  newValue LONGTEXT,
  fieldChanged VARCHAR(100),
  description LONGTEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_taskId (taskId),
  INDEX idx_changedByUserId (changedByUserId),
  INDEX idx_createdAt (createdAt)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS taskHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  historyId VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  taskId VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  changedByUserId INT NOT NULL,
  changeType ENUM('created', 'status_changed', 'priority_changed', 'due_date_changed', 'reassigned', 'notes_added', 'completed', 'cancelled', 'edited') NOT NULL,
  oldValue LONGTEXT,
  newValue LONGTEXT,
  fieldChanged VARCHAR(100),
  description LONGTEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_taskId (taskId),
  INDEX idx_changedByUserId (changedByUserId),
  INDEX idx_createdAt (createdAt)
);
